data.eml:eml: A new species of Hippopsis Lepeletier & Audinet-Serville, 1825 from Panama and key to species (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lamiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Galileo, Maria Helena M., Santos-Silva, Antonio, Heffern, Daniel (2017): A new species of Hippopsis Lepeletier & Audinet-Serville, 1825 from Panama and key to species (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lamiinae). Zootaxa 4263 (1): 173-178, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4263.1.9
